comment.body:
I made a detailed how-to a good while back on [my blog](/1PexoLogqCsGAwYEUNqKnmzccg1r5tzCZ3/) on how to get ZeroNet running with it's own dedicated templateVM and double tor. So maybe this is of interest for you as well.

I recently made a improved slightly more secure way of doing that for the py3 version, which I still need to actually sit down and write. I even made a installer bash script that does most of the work.
